hero.subtitle4: Explore chef-style recipes that bring out the best in every dish.

about.title: Our Story
about.paragraph-1: Founded in 2012, Foodwealth Ltd produces, imports, packages, and distributes premium herbs, spices, and culinary products. Our mission is to combine quality with authenticity, delivering flavors that inspire trust and elevate everyday cooking.
about.paragraph-2: We serve retailers, wholesalers, and foodservice providers across Southeastern Europe, including Greece, Bulgaria, and the Balkans, bringing authentic flavors and innovative products to kitchens everywhere.

brands.title: Discover Our Brands
brands.paragraph: Trusted names from around the world, carefully selected for quality and authenticity.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Explore our wide range of premium herbs, spices, and blends — carefully selected to bring authentic flavors to every kitchen.

recipes.title: Recipes to Inspire
recipes.subtitle: Explore creative ways to use our premium herbs and spices.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Trusted retailers, wholesalers, and foodservice providers across Southeastern Europe.

hero.title: Quality & Authenticity in Every Blend
hero.subtitle: Bringing premium herbs, spices, and culinary products to Southeastern Europe since 2012

aboutUs.title: Excellence in Herbs, Spices & Culinary Products
aboutUs.para1: Founded in 2012, Foodwealth Ltd has become a trusted name in the production, importation, packaging, and distribution of premium herbs, spices, and culinary products throughout Southeastern Europe. Our mission is clear: to combine quality with authenticity, delivering flavors that inspire trust and elevate everyday cooking
aboutUs.para2: We serve a diverse range of partners including retailers, wholesalers, and foodservice providers across Greece, Bulgaria, and the Balkans. Our comprehensive approach ensures that whether you're stocking shelves, supplying restaurants, or creating menu innovations, you have access to products that meet the highest standards.
aboutUs.para3: Every product in our portfolio reflects our commitment to excellence. From careful sourcing and precise blending to professional packaging and reliable distribution, we bring authentic flavors and innovative products to kitchens everywhere in the region.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that drive our business and partnerships

value1.title: Premium Quality
value1.subtitle: We source, package, and distribute only the finest herbs and spices, ensuring every product meets rigorous quality standards that inspire trust in our partners.

value2.title: Partner-Focused approach
value2.subtitle: Building lasting relationships with retailers, wholesalers, and foodservice providers across Southeastern Europe through reliability and excellence.

value3.title: AUTHENTIC fLAVOURS
value3.subtitle: Our commitment to authentic flavors drives us to carefully select and blend products that honor culinary traditions while meeting modern demands.

value4.title: Southeastern Europe Expertise
value4.subtitle: Deep understanding of the Southeastern European market enables us to deliver products perfectly suited to local tastes and preferences across Greece, Bulgaria, and the Balkans.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: Growing alongside our partners across Southeastern Europe

journey1.title: The Foundation
journey1.subtitle: Foodwealth Ltd was established with a vision to become the premier supplier of herbs, spices, and culinary products in Southeastern Europe.

journey2.title: Market Expansion
journey2.subtitle: Extended distribution network across Greece and Bulgaria, building strong partnerships with leading retailers and wholesalers.

journey3.title: Product Innovation
journey3.subtitle: Expanded our portfolio with innovative culinary products and premium packaging solutions to meet evolving market needs.

journey4.title: Regional Leadership
journey4.subtitle: Serving as a trusted partner throughout the Balkans, combining quality with authenticity to elevate everyday cooking across the region.

business.title: Serving Southeastern Europe
business.subtitle: Supporting retail, wholesale, and foodservice partners across the region

support1.title: Retailers
support1.subtitle: Deep understanding of the Southeastern European market enables us to deliver products perfectly suited to local tastes and preferences across Greece, Bulgaria, and the Balkans.

support2.title: wHOLEsALERS
support2.subtitle: Bulk solutions and flexible distribution options tailored to wholesale partners' diverse needs. From small orders to large-scale distribution, we scale with you.

support3.title: Foodservice
support3.subtitle: Reliable supply solutions designed to meet the demands of restaurants, hotels, and catering partners, ensuring consistent quality, efficiency, and timely delivery.

whyus.title: Why choose us?
whyus.subtitle: Experience the difference that quality, sustainability, and passion make in every product.
whyus.subtitle2: Every spice undergoes rigorous testing and quality control. Handpicked at peak freshness, sourced from the world's finest spice gardens, and delivered directly to your kitchen.
whyus.subtitle3: Small-batch processing ensures maximum flavor and aroma in every package.
whyus.subtitle4: Our products come from sustainable sources, respecting nature and local communities.
